title: Ride for Our Republic
description: A cycling event to raise awareness against tyranny and promote democracy, occurring on the last Saturday of each month. Participants ride through specified locations starting from Paul Revere Park and ending at Minuteman Bikeway, totaling 12.7 miles.
address: Paul Revere Park at N Washington St, Boston
raw_text:
RIDE FOR OUR REPUBLIC
We cycle together to sound the alarm of tyranny and fight for our democracy.
A Recurring #Ride4Republic on the last Saturday of the month
Next Rides Sat. July 26th and Aug. 30th
Starting Location: Paul Revere Park at N Washington St, Boston
Waypoint(s): Davis Square in Somerville at 10:45am
Uncle Sam Park Arlington Center at 11:30am
End Location: Minuteman Bikeway, Lexington Center, 12:30pm
1st part 3.9 miles + 2nd part 3.8 miles + 3rd part 5 miles =12.7 miles
Follow the Ride for Our Republic Facebook Page
raw_summary: The flyer promotes "Ride for Our Republic," a recurring cycling event to raise awareness against tyranny and promote democracy. The next rides are scheduled for July 26th and August 30th. The event begins at Paul Revere Park in Boston with two waypoints and ends at Minuteman Bikeway in Lexington. Participants are encouraged to follow the event's Facebook page.

title: Stop Avelo Save the Everglades
description: We are organizing a peaceful demonstration to oppose the contracts awarded to Avelo for removal flights, which affect the Everglades, and to challenge government actions. Join us to stand for the rights of individuals and the protection of our environment.
address: Intersection of Harden Blvd & Town Center Dr
raw_text:
HOSTED BY DEFUND OLIGARCHY BLESSED BY LIBERTY

STOP AVELO
SAVE THE EVERGLADES

SAT JUL 26
5PM - 7PM

INTERSECTION OF HARDEN BLVD & TOWN CENTER DR
LAKELAND, FL

KEEP FLORIDA WILD & FREE ABOLISH ICE

Avelo accepted a $150 million contract to operate removal flights, aiding in the illegal removal of individuals without their right to a fair hearing or due process. DHS has seized protected land in the Everglades and FEMA funds to build a concentration camp and operate removal flights, despite the objections of Miccosukee, Collier & Dade County, environmental scientists, and millions of Floridians. DeSantis is a coward paying $450 million per year of state taxpayer money for Alligator Auschwitz. Say NO to development. Give us back our Everglades!

QUIET DEMONSTRATION. DO NOT PARK AT AIRPORT. KIDS, INSTRUMENTS, & COSTUMES WELCOME

FOR ADDRESS & MORE INFO, VISIT: BLESSEDBYLIBERTY.ORG
raw_summary: The image promotes a peaceful demonstration against Avelo airlines and government actions affecting the Everglades. Hosted by Defund Oligarchy Blessed by Liberty, it includes specific event details like date, time, and location.

title: Olympia Visibility Brigade
description: We deploy each weekend on overpasses in the Olympia-Tumwater-Lacey area, on Mondays during evening rush hour, and support Capitol protests when possible. Bring your high-viz protest signs, flags, fun costumes, and a good mood.
meeting_location: Eastside St. SE over I-5, Olympia
raw_text:
Impatient for the next big protest? Us too! Join us weekly to make good trouble!

OLYMPIA VISIBILITY BRIGADE

We deploy each weekend on overpasses in the Olympia-Tumwater-Lacey area
We also deploy on Mondays during evening rush hour
We support Capitol protests when possible

Bring your high-viz protest signs, flags, fun costumes, a good mood, and be tolerant of terrible dancing. Introverts welcome!

Upcoming Event:
Monday, July 28th @ 4:30 - 6:30 pm
Eastside St. SE over I-5, Olympia

DEMOCRACY IS UNDER ATTACK
STAND UP FIGHT BACK!

Look for upcoming Olympia Visibility Brigade events at thelop.org and backbonecampaign.org
